components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incident_updates.body: We are investigating intermittent service disruption issues with the Flex Twilio platform. Customers may experience connections errors or failures while logging into their Flex account and Flex insights. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
We are investigating a service interruption with Flex. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still still experiencing Auto-Recharge triggers firing incorrectly starting June 13th. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still still experiencing Auto-Recharge triggers firing incorrectly starting June 13th. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still still experiencing Auto-Recharge triggers firing incorrectly starting June 13th. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems detected an issue with Auto-Recharge triggers firing incorrectly starting June 13th. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing our investigation and have discovered that 500 errors for some Twilio Websites is impacting multiple regions. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing our investigation and have discovered that 500 errors for some Twilio Websites is impacting other regions too. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing our investigation and have discovered that 500 errors for some Twilio Websites is impacting other regions too. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue investigating an elevated rate of 500 errors for some Twilio Websites in Europe. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue investigating an elevated rate of 500 errors for some Twilio Websites in Europe. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently investigating an elevated rate of 500 errors for some Twilio Websites in Europe. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in  1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with 500 errors for some Twilio pages. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

The KDDI Corporation in Japan is conducting a planned maintenance from 21 June 2023 at 11:00 PDT until 21 June 2023 at 13:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Japan handsets.

The Tele2 Network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance From 21 June 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 21 June 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window. There could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Megafon and Yota

incident_updates.body: The Megafon and Yota networks in Russia are conducting a planned maintenance from 21 June 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 21 June 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window. There could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Megafon and Yota Russia handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: The AT&T network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 21 June 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 22 June 2023 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from AT&T US handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Global Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance -Three UK

incident_updates.body:
Our Global Carrier Partner Three UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 21 June 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 21 June 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destinations: Austria, Indonesia, Italy, UK
Impacted Products - Carrier
Silent Network Authentication (SNA) - 3 Indonesia, Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK
Lookup SIM Swap - 3 Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK
Identity Match - Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: Italy Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Carrier Partner Wind(Tre) Italy is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 June 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 25 June 2023 at 02:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Wind(Tre) Italy customers.
Impacted Products: Lookup SIM Swap

Our SMS carrier partner in Israel is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 June 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 25 June 2023 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from a subset of Israel handsets.

We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Our carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 June 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 06 July 2023 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from Verizon US handsets when sending via US shortcode

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:
19 June 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 20 June 2023 at 21:00 PDT
27 June 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 28 June 2023 at 21:00 PDT
05 July 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 06 July 2023 at 21:00 PDT
